description:
Affiliate marketing is a great way to enjoy an unlimited residual income stream year after year.

In this video series course you will learn how to make money by becoming an amazon affiliate, leverage amazon for maximum profit, find the best relevant products, create amazing content and product reviews that appeal to buyers, build links and create a continuous flow of traffic back to your website or blog, how to monitor and improve conversion rates, and the best affiliate marketing tips that will help grow and expand your affiliate business and make you residual income for years to come!

Let's look at how you do that.

1. Find A Product - First you need to do some research in the amazon market place to ensure you understand the industry. You also need to know what's trending and how the product fits into your niche.

2. Keyword Research & SEO – You'll need to understand the role of keywords and how to incorporate them into your content to help people find your website.

3. Domain Name - You need to know how to choose the right domain name that is specific to your niche.

4. The RIght Content, Product Reviews – You'll learn how to do some research and evaluate the pro's and con's of the products/service and why the desire for it is so great; how to increase your sales by offering good content about in your site.

5. Product Comparisons - You need to understand the product/services you are selling and know the difference between high commission products and low commission products and how they will effect your percentage.

6. Get Traffic By Building Links - This is paramount to the success of your website or blog. Marketing and traffic to any business is very important and you are going to learn how to build links and get free traffic to your site naturally and ethically.

7. Monitor and Improve Conversion Rates - You need to know how to track the functioning and performance of your website or blog so that you can tweak it or make the necessary changes to increase you conversion rates.

8. Scaling It Up - You need to grow and expand your business by planning, gradually and consistently adding sites, back-links, products, and outsourcing.

9. Success Tips - You need to be mentally motivated and committed to establishing and making your business solid, implement the marketing strategies, and adapt to change as it comes.

Incorporate these steps and you are on your way to becoming a Super Affiliate Marketer!
title: How To Make Residual Income & Retire Early-Amazon Affiliate!
